alert.note: Alert for Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 3:05PM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total ice accumulations of four tenths to one half of an inch. Total sleet and snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Arkansas, Craighead, Poinsett and Mississippi Counties. In Missouri, Pemiscot County. * WHEN...From 6 PM Wednesday to midnight CST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Expect power outages and tree damage due to the ice. Travel could be impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep extra blankets, food, water and a flashlight in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
